description:
Deep within the Steadfast Mountains, the stalwart everok reside, wielding stone and fire to bring about the realisation of their noble goals. The power of the Mountain Order is one of sturdiness and hardiness, yet with potential to rend all foes with fire and stone. 

This power is now yours to bend to your will with our Mountain Pack. Included in this pack is: 

- A huge and challenging 10 stage campaign with 10 unique boss encounters!
- 3 Storm-theme booster packs with a guarantee of at least one rare (or better!) card per pack!

Grab your Mountain Pack now and bring the power of earth and fire to your Lightseekers decks!
name: Lightseekers Mountain Pack
